Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Holiday Inn Farnborough in Farnborough, you'll be convenient to Farnborough Air Sciences Trust Museum and Royal Army Physical Training Corps Museum. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Kingsmead Shopping Centre and St Michaels Abbey.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 142 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Farnborough? This hotel has 2087 square feet (194 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Farnborough is London (LHR-Heathrow) - 30.5 km / 19 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Farnborough is London (LHR-Heathrow) - 30.5 km / 19 mi.
